title: New champion select coming to Ranked soon
body:
Hey everyone,

The new champ select is currently slated to go live in NA and TR for testing on January 14, 2016. If everything goes well, this will then be rolled out to OCE ranked queue in the following days.

You can read more about the new champ select here - 
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/new-champ-select.html

Or check out this video from OCE resident Disco Heat on the PBE
https://youtu.be/qZg9wqIeddU

replies.body: So we aren't getting Draft Pick Normals for this after all?

The testing process for the new champ select has gone faster than expected. That means that no regions will be doing an extended beta period like was originally planned. The good news is that means that champ select will be live on NA and TR for Ranked for a 72-hour testing cycle beginning on the 14th. If that goes well it will then be rolled one at a time to the other regions including OCE.

This means that the plan to have Normal Draft enabled for a short time to test the new champ select is no longer necessary. It is coming to Ranked soon and the plan is for it to replace Blind Pick sometime in the future.
Thank you for such a clear and informative responce <3
Thanks Riot For a solid answer{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
we just want draft normals enabled for good in oce, its soo painful to que for normals when you dont have a 5 premade that i dont even do it anymore,
He's saying this new queue is going to replace Blind Pick for us on OCE. No more instalockers.
Why was Normal Draft Queue turned off in the first place?
OCE has a much lower population than most other regions.  Queue times would be a lot longer if the 'normals' community were split between blind and draft.

Has there / will there be any update on draft pick for OCE replacing current blind pick?  I have been looking forward to normal draft for a while and it's pretty disheartening to not hear anything about it for months now. Kind of seems like we just aren't going to get it.

Hi Sephyre,
Has there been any progress made for the new champ select to be moved to the normal que and replace blind pick yet?
Does that mean a new season? Or is it just a ranked update?

No, the new queue replaces Normal Blind and Draft Normal on OCE.

Yes, that means Normal Blind will be disappearing.

Finally...
http://img.memecdn.com/Dont-let-them-see_c_106158.jpg

I would finally be able to play on the new season but the problem is that nobody knows exactly when the season out {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
J'aimerais enfin pouvoir joué sur la nouvelle saison mais le problème c'est que personne ne sais quand la saison sortira précisément
It's roughly sometime after the 18th.
its coming out on the 21st of January
20th, oce gets theirs a day before the others now because rito wants us as test dogs
So is oce receiving draft normals?{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

I don't think so, because we're OCE and no one cares about us
{{item:3070}}
ikr nobody cares about OCE {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
yeh we will be getting draft normals but it will be replacing blind normals
wow the new champ select looks like sex on the beach

Well 
I fucking hate it :D
agreed, it ruins the fun of random.
So you prefer to have trolls that instalock and go bot??

idgaf its normals, you use it to blow off ranked steam, its where you go to get away from the people in ranked who cant do much but be toxic when someone does a mistake, igniting an argument which results in feeding and losing
I play ranked and pretty much refuse to go into normals unless premade because it's such a waste of time.

And for those that don't play ranked because of the level of Bad and Toxic and that just play normals as their primary game mode? You realise that you're just screwing up the game for them when you play with that mindset?
The game doesn't revolve around you dude, there's other people involved that might not appreciate this and see you as the toxic one.
this is a great idea, so as soon as you hit lvl 30 you get into ranked, i thought riot wanted to improve the game¿ instead they inject the ranked system with even more unskilled players ... sigh

Dude, as much as i hate to say it, but rranked que is the best learning curve for anyone, even if they are placed in bronze. Normals can have the worst matchmaking, with games where everyone jsut isolates in their own lane!

I agree here, Ranked has a better chance of matching you with people around your skill level, where as Normals, it has a completely random chance, (from my games anyway) I have been in Silver for 3 seasons now, (Just because I don't play Ranked often) and I get matched with high Platinums to Diamonds in my Normal games
Can concur, I'm B2 on my main and Im consistently placed with Plats, Diamonds and the odd Master every normal game
Those plats and diamonds you mentioned are bronze level, they bought their accounts and have a bronze MMR, same happening with me, except I'm not bronze

Not really, depends on who they are premade with. I play against bronze and silvers all the time when I'm premade with bronze and silver. Likewise when I queue up with plat or gold friends, that's all we usually see.
Except I highly doubt any bronze player would be matched up with Masters... that would break the system and defeat the purpose of rank

There is only one problem with this. The trolls know who you would want to be playing so they could ban the people you want to be. Other than thats this is really good. I think this is better than the one we had before but still, the trolls...
You do not need to declare the champ you want to play if you don't want to. It's there so that your team mates know not to ban your champ.

That is true, although it does take a bit away from the 'team communication' RIOT has tried to do, people can see prior to picks the team combination that their team is wanting to put together.  But it is a good idea for people whom get trolls regularly don't feel safe when showing what champion they are planning to play. 

Personally, I feel this new System for Champion Select is going to stop a large amount of trolls and help people play together as a team more in games.
This looks Awesome!!

So is there no more team ranked? and if there is can u 5 man lobby in solo Que?

also the new champ select is pretty sick
There is still going to be ranked 5's, you can queue up with up to 3 of your friends (4 man queue) in ranked solo, and then if you have a 5th, you can play in ranked teams
You can still do solo if you feel like going in with 5 people pre-made.  Instead of effecting your Team ranked 5's it'll sill effect your solo queue rank.
I dont like how long the queue times are going to be, I like the idea, but Ranked was all about being able to play all the roles. Not just two
YES THANK YOU RIOT FINALLY!

A precise date for the release of season 6 ? Thanks you
Une date précise pour la sortie de la saison 6 ? Merci

I wondered how this would happen on OCE.
This is replacing the Team Builder queues on both the NA and TR servers but obviously we no longer have team builder due to lack of people playing the mode.  So we get it straight to ranked :).

Would definitely like to see this have an non-ranked version too though. Perhaps consider bringing back Team Builder to OCE if the ranked gets really popular ???
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

I love this idea!!! :D
There will be so many fewer trolls as getting where you want wont rely on typing in the chat with can bug!
The angry people wont have any reason to troll the ranked games XD{{summoner:30}} 
Cant wait

Wait. Only for Ranked? 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
its been 11 days already whens the new champion select roll out?
